channel.title: 🏢 Faculty of Data and Decision Sciences, Technion on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Faculty of Data and Decision Sciences, Technion on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: When to Act and When to Ask: Policy Learning With Deferral Under Hidden Confounding
item.description: CARED: a novel causal action recommendation model improves policy learning by collaborating with human experts and mitigating hidden confounding in observational data.
